heading: HR01376
0: A RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES IN SUPPORT OF OMBUDSMAN CONCHITA CARPIO-MORALES, OVERALL DEPUTY OMBUDSMAN MELCHOR ARTHUR CARANDANG, AND THE OFFICE OF THE OMBUDSMAN IN PURSUIT OF ITS MANDATE AS VANGUARDS AGAINST CORRUPTION IN GOVERNMENT AS WELL AS TO ENJOIN OTHER GOVERNMENT INSTITUTIONS TO RESPECT THE INDEPENDENCE OF THE OFFICE OF THE OMBUDSMAN AS SET FORTH BY THE CONSTITUTION
principal-authors: LAGMAN, EDCEL C.; BAGUILAT, TEDDY JR. BRAWNER; BILLONES, EMMANUEL A.; ERICE, EDGAR R.; VILLARIN, TOM S.; ALEJANO, GARY C.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-10-09
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01376
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES IN SUPPORT OF OMBUDSMAN CONCHITA CARPIO-MORALES, OVERALL DEPUTY OMBUDSMAN MELCHOR ARTHUR CARANDANG, AND THE OFFICE OF THE OMBUDSMAN IN PURSUIT OF ITS MANDATE AS VANGUARDS AGAINST CORRUPTION IN GOVERNMENT AS WELL AS TO ENJOIN OTHER GOVERNMENT INSTITUTIONS TO RESPECT THE INDEPENDENCE OF THE OFFICE OF THE OMBUDSMAN AS SET FORTH BY THE CONSTITUTION
